page.title: 16POLICE
page.content: The community policeman for Parson Cross is PC David Kidman, who has been in the force for 17 years. He has to get involved with the people & he visits schools, shops & generally talks to the public. The police can't be on every street corner so they rely on the people for information. At the Niagra Ground the police have recreational facilities including squash courts, snooker tables, weight training & a football & rugby pitch. We also saw a bar which was open to the public. We then moved onto the dogs & horses which were very tall. The ones in the stables had been sent down for a rest after being fully trained. We saw the best saddles & helmets that are used for shows & displays. They think that horses are better at keeping law & order because you cant push them over.
